name: Michael Bracey
summary_1: I specialise in front-end development, and love learning new technology!
summary_2: In the past year I have been travelling East Europe and South-East Asia, as well as working on personal projects (see below).

highlights: Worked in an Agile team, where we had two week sprints, I helped build and maintain casino games such as slot machines and scratch cards.
Conducted research on building games with Unity and C#.
Obtained a distinction grade in my Level 4 Software Developer Apprenticeship.
Designed and developed mobile-first microsites for clients to advertise job vacancies.
Worked as part of an international team to build salary guide sites for different European regions such as France, Portugal, Poland, etc.
Maintained and fixed existing microsites, while making sure they still work on different browsers and devices.
Required significant multi-tasking and adaptability, switching between tasks and taking a proactive approach.
Worked as part of a large team to ensure all customersâ€™ orders were taken and delivered quickly and to a high standard of quality.
Developed excellent rapport with both customers and colleagues in order to fully understand and meet their needs.

education.name: Software Developer Apprenticeship with Multiverse
education.summary: Completed and achieved a distinction grade in my Level 4 Software Developer Apprenticeship.

education.name: IT Career Switch
education.summary: A 12 month coding traineeship to develop the skills needed to become a full stack developer.

education.name: Introduction to Programming with Python Short Course
education.summary: Enrolled with University of London for a month of online lectures and coding exercises to learn about programming with Python.

education.name: Richard Challoner School
education.summary: Finished secondary school with A Levels in Physics, Maths and Geography, and 10 GCSEs.
